Langsam Resources

These links may be useful in either locating or expanding upon your family:

  • Langsam's in the Ellis Island Database
  • NARA Ship Arrival Microfilm Roll Numbers
    2 January 1892 - 31 December 1924
  • SSDI of Langsams
  • NYC Naturalization Petition Index
    1907-24
  • Brooklyn Naturalization Index
    1907-24
  • Canadian Langsam's Lookup
  • Jewish Heritage Centre of Western Canada Langsam's Lookup
  • The JGFF Langsam Family Researchers
  • Langsam-Spira Book Contact Letter
  • Ancestry.com Search Results for Langsam July 18, 2002
  • 1930 Census Index for LANGSAM
  • California Births Database (1905-1995) for LANGSAM

The links to the left contain information, sometimes in the form of an e-mail, that enhances what may already be known from The Langsam-Spira Family book.

I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
